Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory11.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Construct Soldier', 3: "Take my arm. It's likely not as good as your original one, but at least it's still army grade.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Construct Soldier', 3: "I can't even move a finger now. It will be of better use in your hands. Please, defeat the Corrupted. I'll be counting on you.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'I understand. Thank you.', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Without the means to salute, Lucia paid her respects to this Construct soldier through her wordless gaze.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Construct Soldier', 3: 'One more thing. Our squad had to abandon some weapon supplies when we engaged with the Corrupted just now. There are Levi-Gun core components in there.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Construct Soldier', 3: 'If you can secure them, then that Support-type Construct over there should be able to hop back into action.', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Liv looks expectantly at you.'}
{2: "Let's go together then.", 3: '21', 4: 'The risk is too big.', 5: '24'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "Gray Raven needs to recover quickly. Commandant, I believe you've witnessed the power of Liv's Levi-Guns before.", 4: '3'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Please reconsider, Commandant.', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Construct Soldier', 3: 'Alright, that should be all. Good luck, and may we meet again on a better occasion...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'System', 3: 'Recalibrating neural link parameters...'}
{2: 'System', 3: 'M.I.N.D. deviation coefficient decreased by 0.015...'}
{2: 'System', 3: 'Consciousness: Lucia, online...'}
{3: 'PanelActor2Shake', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: "Are you still in pain? I've treated more of your wounds...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "No, it's... nothing. Just, feeling unaccustomed to the sudden return of pain reception...", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "It's good that you feel pain. Only then will your M.I.N.D. model slowly return to normal.", 4: '3'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'Now, try moving your new arm.', 4: '3'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: "Oh... It's very smooth, as if it was mine all along. How did you do that, Lee?", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: 'I adjusted and buffered the possible kinetic deviations according to your previous movement dataâ€”', 4: '3'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "What I mean is that, I had a feeling you'd do something like this someday, so I've made config presets of different limb models for you.", 4: '3'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: "You're always so dependable when it comes to mechanics, Lee.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Lucia nods earnestly.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: '... (The sarcasm flew right over their heads... Sigh...)', 4: '3'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "Anyway, we'll still need to test its functionality in actual battle.", 4: '3'}
